sentences.english: Mannitol accumulates more than other little molecular carbohydrates in A. mellea.
sentences.chinese: 甘露醇是蜜環菌體內積累較多的小分子糖類成分。

sentences.english: Sugar, however, blocked the release of orexin.
sentences.chinese: 糖類則會阻礙促食素的釋放。

sentences.english: Try not to overdo it on the sugars and starch.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫太多糖類食品和澱粉。

sentences.english: Improving saccharometabolism, reducing blood sugar, preventing and curing diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 改善糖類代謝，降血糖，防治糖尿病。

sentences.english: Soluble fiber is the kind that slows down the rate of absorption of sugars.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性纖維會降低你的糖類攝入速度。

sentences.english: The more intensely you exercise, the higher proportion of carbs you burn.
sentences.chinese: 你的運動強度越大，熱量消耗中糖類所佔的比例越高。

sentences.english: Trade in good, complex carbohydrates (low glycemic index) for the bad, simple carbs (sugar).
sentences.chinese: 用低糖或者複雜的糖類代替不良單糖。

sentences.english: 'Thus sugar is good for you, ' say the sugar manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 糖類製造者說‘因此，糖是對你有好處的’。

sentences.english: Make sure your child gets enough protein and carbohydrates in their diets.
sentences.chinese: 確保孩子在飲食上得到足夠的蛋白質和糖類。

sentences.english: The biggest challenge is cutting out sugar.
sentences.chinese: 最大的挑戰就是拒絕喫糖類。

sentences.english: The Daily Food Guide acknowledges this by identifying the fat-sweets group.
sentences.chinese: 每日膳食指南通過鑑定脂肪一糖類確認了這一點。

sentences.english: In recent years, low saccharide food more and more get the favour of people.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，低糖類食品越來越受到人們的青睞。

sentences.english: Pharmaceutical analysis is an important part of analytical chemistry.
sentences.chinese: 論文第三章分析了天然藥物中的糖類組分。

sentences.english: The receptor for hemagglutinin may be a carbohydrate.
The strains showed no chemotaxis toward the carbohydrates.
sentences.chinese: 菌株對糖類物質的趨化性最弱。

sentences.english: Molecular structure of saccharide-based biological materials.
sentences.chinese: 糖類基生物材料的分子結構。

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1
